text: The Stollé synthesis is a series of chemical reactions that produce oxindoles from anilines and α-haloacid chlorides (or oxalyl chloride). The Stollé synthesis The first step is an amide coupling, while the second step is a Friedel–Crafts reaction. An improved procedure has been developed. ==See also== *Indole *Hinsberg oxindole synthesis ==References== Category:Carbon- carbon bond forming reactions Category:Heterocycle forming reactions Category:Name reactions
title: Stollé synthesis
